name: Chilli Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch coriander, stems and roots only, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Roughly chop coriander stems and roots. Combine in a small food processor with garlic, ginger and chillies and process until finely chopped. Add dates and process until well combined.

Transfer to a small saucepan. Stir in vinegar, honey and 11/4 cups water. Bring to the boil over medium heat, then simmer for 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally, until sauce has reduced and thickened to desired consistency. Use as a dipping sauce for fish cakes or dim sims, or add lime juice and use as a salad dressing.
